backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing per-user game design data with access control and admin-editable master prompt.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing required updates to the GDD template's competition mechanics section.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files, including templates, hooks, pages, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions with OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML root that loads the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for GDD and Plan Input pages using AppShell.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state, errors, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/gdd/GddExportAct: Buttons for printing the GDD and downloading it as Markdown.
frontend/src/components/gdd/GddSectionAc: Accordion renderer for GDD sections with HTML formatting of Markdown-like syntax.
frontend/src/components/gdd/SaveStatusBa: Status bar showing authentication, save status, and save action button.
Main layout with header, navigation tabs, footer, and login button wrapping routed pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, login state, and provides identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanInputState.ts: Stores and updates plan input data, merges it into the GDD template, and syncs with backend user data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user game data and roles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles, theme variables, print styles, and custom scrollbar definitions.
frontend/src/lib/gddExport.ts: Generates and downloads a Markdown-formatted GDD document from section data.
frontend/src/lib/gddMerge.ts: Replaces placeholders in GDD template sections with user plan input values for plan-dependent sections.
frontend/src/lib/gddTemplate.ts: Defines the GDD section interface, a placeholder constant, and a large static template of game design sections.
frontend/src/lib/planInputSchema.ts: Defines plan input fields, default values, and a parser that maps user inputs to structured GDD fields with fallbacks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/GddPage.tsx: Displays the generated GDD with loading skeletons, save status, export actions, and an accordion of sections.
frontend/src/pages/PlanInputPage.tsx: Provides a form for editing plan input fields, showing save status, structured inputs, and a raw plan text area.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, writing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s current GDD and architecture progress, noting Phase 1 completion, required updates to the competition/market section, and outlines the planned 5‑canister ICP backend. Also records architectural notes, known missing source materials, and existing feature definitions for the app.
